name: The 7th World Conference on Management, Business and Economics
content: Join us from March 21-23, 2025, in Prague, Czech Republic, for the 7th World Conference on Management, Business and Economics (WORLDMBE). With engaging presentations, vibrant networking opportunities, and immersive learning experiences, this conference is a must-attend for scholars, researchers, scientists, and other academics. Don’t forget the important deadlines, whether you’re participating as a virtual, poster, oral presenter, or attendee. This is your chance to get published in indexed journals and share your findings with our extensive international academic network. Plus, enjoy a free tour of the beautiful city of Prague, making this event memorable for years to come. As a listener, WORLDMBE offers you the chance to learn about areas outside your expertise and to engage in face-to-face conversations about current projects and research. Even if you’re not actively networking, you’ll gain valuable suggestions and fresh insights that can enhance your own work. You’ll leave WORLDMBE having grown as a scholar. The conference program is thoughtfully designed to address the latest trends and challenges in the field. Each presentation provides unique insights into critical topics, ranging from diverse approaches to the latest methodologies. Past editions have offered publication opportunities, with conference proceedings available free of charge to all registered presenters. Both in-person and virtual presentations will be featured.
